seo.metaTitle: Le Privé | All-electric Hassle-free RV Trailer | Pebble
seo.metaDescription: Defining a new way to work, live and explore from anywhere with the Le Privé, an all-electric travel trailer that’s bringing an iPhone-like experience to RVing.

content.title: Le Privé
content.rightContent:
Lighter living that’s never idle,
and always, simply magical.

content.content:
We’ve designed
Le Privé as the perfect
combination of beauty and
strength.

children.text: Le Privé has been built using rigorous automotive manufacturing processes. All aluminum space frame construction. Lightweight composite and sustainable materials. Built-to-last durability that surpasses industry standards. A commitment to making Pebble the safest RV trailer on the road.

We've spent countless hours refining the curves and lines through advanced computational simulations. The Le Privé is 300% as aerodynamic as a conventional travel trailer with better mileage, longer range, and an overall safer towing experience.
Adventure-resistant, automotive-grade paint in nature-inspired colors that complement, not compete with, your surroundings.

children.text: Panoramic windows give way to a 270° view. Convertible furniture, clever storage compartments, and minimalist, modern interior give you everything you need and the flexibility to make it your own.

content.content:
We worked hard to 
make everything easy.
content.paragraph: By simplifying every aspect of RV life, we’ve made it accessible and comfortable for everyone.

items.title: silent hvac
items.subtitle: Stay comfortable
items.content: Whether you want to heat things up or cool things off, simply pre-set the whisper-quiet HVAC with the Pebble App so it’s comfortable as soon as you set up camp. The fully-insulated shell keeps the temperatures just right and the external ultra-high efficiency heat pump keeps things quiet.

items.title: Chef's Kitchen
items.subtitle: Cook Incredibly
items.content: The kitchen features a Wandering Cooktop (a removable indoor/outdoor induction range), a 4-in-1 convection microwave oven, and a full-size fridge. Settle in for a great meal at the built-in dinette for four or pass through the flip-up service window to dine al fresco.

items.title: Spa Bathroom
items.subtitle: Retreat and revive
items.content: Extend the feeling of spaciousness and tranquility in your bathroom by adjusting the transparency of your shower glass. Taking inspiration from the most sophisticated hotel bathrooms, our design features LED lighting, contemporary fixtures, and a state-of-the-art macerating toilet.

items.title: deep sleep
items.subtitle: Rest easy
items.content: A good day outside demands a great night’s sleep. The Pebble features 1 queen and 1 full bed for sleeping up to 4, dimmable LED lighting, and a night sky roof panel so you can rest easy under the stars.

items.title: room flip
items.subtitle: Work from anywhere
items.content: Lightweight, flexible furnishings help you move from leisure time to work time within seconds. The queen bed converts to a work-from-anywhere office with mobile internet, integrated power outlets, LED task lighting, and plug & play Starlink connectivity*. *separate subscription required

children.text: Whether you want to heat things up or cool things off, simply pre-set the whisper-quiet HVAC with the Pebble App so it’s comfortable as soon as you set up camp. The fully-insulated shell keeps the temperatures just right and the external ultra-high efficiency heat pump keeps things quiet.

The kitchen features a Wandering Cooktop (a removable indoor/outdoor induction range), a 4-in-1 convection microwave oven, and a full-size fridge. Settle in for a great meal at the built-in dinette for four or pass through the flip-up service window to dine al fresco.

Extend the feeling of spaciousness and tranquility in your bathroom by adjusting the transparency of your shower glass. Taking inspiration from the most sophisticated hotel bathrooms, our design features LED lighting, contemporary fixtures, and a state-of-the-art macerating toilet.

A good day outside demands a great night’s sleep. The Pebble features 1 queen and 1 full bed for sleeping up to 4, dimmable LED lighting, and a night sky roof panel so you can rest easy under the stars.

Lightweight, flexible furnishings help you move from leisure time to work time within seconds. The queen bed converts to a work-from-anywhere office with mobile internet, integrated power outlets, LED task lighting, and plug & play Starlink connectivity*. *separate subscription required

content.paragraph: Pebble converts sun-powered energy into super-charged power. The Le Privé introduces energy flexibility, with multiple ways to use and share your power.

items.contentText: No more fossil fuels, buzzing generators, and propane tanks. Pebble has power for days.
Self-charging while parked or on the move, keeping your 45 kWh LFP battery topped off effortlessly.
You can power your campsite equipment, appliances, your EV, another RV, or even your home.

content.content:
The magic of
travel goes beyond
the destination.

children.text: Le Privé can sight, align and hitch all by itself. This lightens the load of departure for true get-up-and-go freedom.

This isn’t child’s play. But it could be. The Pebble App and dual-motor drivetrain allow you to reverse, park, and position the Pebble exactly as you’d like without so much as having to look in your rearview mirror. You can even turn the Pebble 360° in place.

With just a touch, the Le Privé deploys camp by auto-leveling, unfolding the stairs, turning on the lights, setting the temperature, and unlocking the door. When you’re ready to head home, retract camp just as easily.

We’ve made towing easier and safer for everyone, even in windy conditions or on a grade. With Le Privé’s dual-motor Active Tow Assist System, towing is finally safe and effortless, whether you’re towing with an SUV or a pick-up truck, a gas vehicle or an EV.

Equipped with a macerating toilet, macerating drain pump, and heated water tanks, this setup is designed for easy waste management. From sinks, shower, toilet to water tanks, every component is engineered for maximum hygiene and efficiency. It just flows.

content.content:
Always be in touch,
even when you’re out
of reach.

items.contentText: The power of the Pebble is at your fingertips. Control, monitor, configure and precondition your Pebble from the simple touch interface of your smart devices.
The world’s smartest RV just keeps getting smarter. With onboard intelligence, Pebble is always evolving and improving with regular updates and new features.
The Pebble is plug-and-play-ready for Starlink so you can be connected wherever you are. Separate hardware and plan subscription required for activation.

children.text: Exterior length: 24'8"
Exterior width: 7’7”
Exterior height: 8’9”
Interior Length: 21'
Interior Width: 7'
Interior Height: 6'5"
Dry Weight: 5,800 lbs
Net Carrying Capacity: 1,000 lbs
Gross Vehicle Weight (GVWR): 6,800 lbs (fully loaded with gear)
Tongue Weight: 680 lbs

Sleeps: 4 people comfortably 
Beds: 1 RV queen murphy bed and 1 convertible full bed
Fresh tank: 40 gallons
Grey tank: 37 gallons
Black tank: 13 gallons
Battery: 45 kWh LFP (Lithium Iron Phosphate)
Charging: L3 DC fast charging, L1/L2 AC charging, 240V or 120V outlets
Tow Assist: dual electric motors (Magic Pack required)
Integrated solar: 1.1 kW (Optional)
Off-grid capability: up to 7 days

items.title: Do I need an EV to tow the Le Privé?

children.text: You don’t need an EV to tow The Le Privé.  Le Privé’s dual-motor Active Tow Assist System provides a safe and effortless towing experience and works great for gas, hybrid or EVs. As long as your vehicle has a towing capacity of at least 6,800 lbs, you’ll be able to tow the Le Privé.

items.title: How do I charge the Le Privé?

children.text: The Le Privé can be charged via  AC/DC charging at public stations, at home, campgrounds, and more. The Le Privé’s optional 1.1 kW integrated solar self-charges on the go and is always topping off its power supply.

items.title: Does the Pebble App require the Internet to connect and communicate with the Le Privé?

children.text: No. All communication necessary for Le Privé's functions is kept within a local network, bypassing the need for cloud or internet service providers. This localized communication enables Le Privé's features to operate seamlessly, regardless of your location, even in remote areas.

items.title: What's included in the Magic Pack

children.text: The Magic Pack adds a powerful dual-motor setup and bundles a set of world-first features to the Le Privé, including Remote Control, Magic Hitch, Easy Tow and more.

items.title: Can I power my home with the Le Privé?

children.text: Yes. The total battery capacity of the Le Privé is 3.5x that of a Tesla Powerwall, making it a great home backup battery in the case of an emergency.
We’re thrilled to offer our owners an industry-leading limited warranty program, providing peace of mind no matter where the journey takes you.
Le Privé: 3 years/30k miles*
Motors: 5 years/50k miles*
Battery: 8 years/80k miles*
Appliances, Fixtures & Accessories: 1 year/10k miles*
*whichever comes first

items.title: Where will I be able to service my Le Privé?

children.text: At launch, we will offer service out of our Fremont, CA Headquarters, along with roadside and mobile technician support through a network of trusted partners. Stay connected for updates on network expansion through the customer portal and email newsletter.
Pebble is partnering with several leading lenders that are experienced in the RV industry.  As we begin taking purchase orders, we will provide more details regarding the programs, rates and terms.
